item.title: It's moving time..
item.description:
So I've noticed that I haven't made it clear enough so.. IT'S MOVING TIME :D

I've been updating this older rss.xml for a while now but you people who have been using this one exclusively has missed out on at least two posts.

The new RSS feed (which has ALL older posts) can be found here..

Thank you for your support and have a good day
